Review_Text: You like knowing history and impact of things that led to todays artistic depictions!? This is fun and strange parts of art that few know of and man do they show so many interesting arts we could do today. It is very inspiring and gives so many ideas to do at home. Future generations could find entertainment in this. This is a vivid, lively and amazing documentary. The organization of all the information presented is in a logical order and put together well! An important message they put in this is the audience is just as important as the film. These spike and mike event was such a amazing experience to artists and the viewers.
